title: Angela Rayner – 2022 Comments on Conduct of Gavin Williamson
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Angela Rayner, the Deputy Leader of the Labour Party, on Twitter on 5 November 2022.
content:
The latest episode of Whips at dawn reveals a toxic Tory culture. Yet another misjudged and irresponsible Rishi Sunak ministerial appointment. Anneliese Dodds and I demand answers on why Gavin Williamson has been allowed to resurface in Cabinet.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
